title: Anna Camp wears black leather pants and two-tone dress to promote Perfect Harmony in New York City
text:
Anna Camp rocked a pair of black-and-white outfits Tuesday while promoting her new show Perfect Harmony in New York City.

The 37-year-old actress donned a black top and two-tone skirt for an appearance on Live With Kelly and Ryan.

She later changed into black leather skinny pants and a white blouse with black panels.

Two tone: Anna Camp wore a pair of two-tone outfits Tuesday while promoting her new series Perfect Harmony in New York City

Anna had her blonde hair down in soft curls around her shoulders and accessorized with dangling earrings.

She completed her outfits with black, white and pink shoes.

The actress was promoting her new NBC musical comedy series Perfect Harmony.

Anna stars as single mother and waitress Ginny who sings soprano and leads her Kentucky church choir.

Leather pants: The 37-year-old actress later changed into black leather skinny pants

TV star: Anna stars in Perfect Harmony as single mother and waitress Ginny who sings soprano and leads her Kentucky church choir

Big smile: The actress beamed while promoting her series at the Build Series in NYC

Skinny pants: Anna stunned in a pair of black leather skinny pants

Perfect Harmony also stars Bradley Whitford, 60, who portrays Dr. Arthur Cochran, a former instructor at Princeton who becomes music director for the small church.

Ann played a cappella singer Aubrey Posen in the Pitch Perfect trilogy of films from 2012 to 2017.

Perfect Harmony premiered September 26 on NBC.

Musical comedy: Perfect Harmony centers around a church choir in a small Kentucky town

On stage: The actress fielded questions during her visit to the Build Studio

Anna also is known for her portrayal of villain Sarah Newlin in the HBO vampire drama True Blood.

The South Carolina native also has two films in post-production.

She has a starring role in the romantic comedy The Lovebirds due out on April 3, 2020 by Paramount Pictures.

Busy star: The South Carolina native also has two films in post-production

Anna married her Pitch Perfect co-star Skylar Astin, 32, in 2016 and they announced in April that they were divorcing.

Their divorce was finalized over the summer.

Anna was previously married to actor Michael Mosley, 41, from 2010 to 2013.
description: The 37-year-old actress rocked a pair of black-and-white outfits Tuesday while promoting her new show Perfect Harmony in New York City.
